title: (x) New York Magazine typeface - Elderkin {Mark S}
author: mkstudio

comments.content: That's Eric Olson's Elderkin. He took it off the market a couple of years ago, so it's no longer available.
' [Garage Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20100307011104/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/GarageGothic)', _may be a close, and available, alternate_..
Wow, the original sample has an interesting UC 'R'.

Hi All (and Karen),  
(Karen, how are you doing? I was happy to see you here. Always ask about you when I speak to Jim... I love the R too.)  
I've been in touch with Eric Olson and yes, it is Elderkin - thanks for the id Mark - and it is indeed retired.

Mara, could you have gotten the wrong Karen?  
Although I am married to a guy called Jimmy...

What a coincidence, huh?
You are certainly not the "wrong" Karen, Karen. ;-)
